title: API Key Validation Schema
description: Validates API key format for HTTP transport authentication. Keys must be 32-128 characters, alphanumeric with underscore and hyphen.

errorMessage.type: API key must be a string
errorMessage.pattern: API key must contain only alphanumeric characters, underscores, and hyphens
errorMessage.minLength: API key must be at least 32 characters long
errorMessage.maxLength: API key must not exceed 128 characters
